markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Ammunition Thaumaturgy](/Feats.aspx?ID=3698) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Thaumaturge" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=432" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Dark Archive](/Sources.aspx?ID=129) pg. 42</row>

</column>

---

You're so used to handling your [implement](/classes/thaumaturge/implements), weapon, and esoterica in the heat of combat that adding a few bullets or arrows to the mix is no extra burden. You can Interact to reload a weapon using the hand holding your implement.
name: Ammunition Thaumaturgy
